title: Shadowrun 5E
description:
Hoi omae.

This torrent contains most of the current Shadowrun 5E material published.




Assassin's Primer - Assassin information

Bullets & Bandages - Options book; compatible with 4E & 5E

Core Rulebook (2nd Printing) - contains published errata from 07 Feb 2014

Coyotes - Border-crossing information

Digital Tools Box - Contains the Beginner Box (for players) and Runner's Toolkit: Alphaware (for game masters)

Firing Line - Contains four Missions; compatible with 4E & 5E

Gear Cards, Series 1

Gun H(e)aven 3 - Compatible with 4E & 5E

Run & Gun - Combat rulebook; 5E version of 4E's Arsenal

Splintered State - An introductory adventure for 5E

Sprawl Wilds - Collection of Missions; compatible with 4E & 5E

Stolen Souls - Deep shadows sourcebook

Street Grimoire - Magic options; 5E version of 4E's Street Magic




Shadowrun Missions Season 5:

SR Missions 5A-01: Chasin' the Wind

SR Missions 5A-02: Critic's Choice

SR Missions 5A-03: Gone Long Gone




Enhanced Fiction and Short Story (contains epub, mobi, and pdf formats):

Nothing Personal

Sail Away Sweet Sister - Compatible with 4E & 5E

The Vladivostok Gauntlet - First published short story




Missing material:

Spell Cards, Series 1




Enjoy chummer.
